name: file-type-detector
title: File Type Detector
description: Identify file types by analyzing magic bytes and metadata
content:
Overview

This application identifies file types by analyzing magic bytes and metadata. Built using python-magic, it provides accurate file type detection regardless of file extensions.

Features

  • Detects MIME types by analyzing file content
  • Provides detailed file descriptions
  • Identifies character encoding
  • Generates comprehensive detection reports
  • Works independently of file extensions

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload the file to analyze from stash
  • Verbose Mode: Enable detailed output with additional file information
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the report

Output

The application generates a detailed text report containing MIME type, file description, encoding, and optional additional metadata.

Use Cases

  • Verifying file types when extensions are missing or incorrect
  • Identifying unknown or suspicious files
  • Analyzing file uploads for security purposes
  • Batch file type identification and classification
